trans-unit.source: Computes aggregates over a sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列的彙總。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Averages <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值的平均。

trans-unit.source: Gets an average of the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列的平均。

trans-unit.source: The average of the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列的平均。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" /> contains a result.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" /> 是否包含結果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" /> contains a result; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DecimalAggregator" /> 包含結果，傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is greater than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 參數大於現有結果，則將 <paramref name="value" /> 參數指派給該現有結果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the largest value among the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The largest value among the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is less than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 參數小於現有結果，則將 <paramref name="value" /> 參數指派給該現有結果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the smallest value among the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The smallest value among the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see langword="Decimal" /> value to the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值與現有結果相加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sum of the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列的總和。

trans-unit.source: The sum of the sequence of <see langword="Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> 值序列的總和。
